items.summary: Update the Profile page (public profile section) user-facing labels to match the new business-oriented wording: Skills → "Business name", Programming Languages → "Slogan", Current Projects → "Business Description", Activity Interests → "Location".

Add a new "Number" (phone/number) field to the user profile model, collected and saved from the Profile page when the profile visibility is Public, and hidden/cleared when visibility is Private (consistent with other public-only fields).
Update profile validation to include the new "Number" field (only when visibility is Public) with reasonable constraints and an English validation error message when invalid.

Update the Members Directory UI to display the renamed field labels for public profiles: "Business name", "Slogan", "Business Description", and "Location" (only when the corresponding values are present and the viewer is allowed to see them under existing visibility rules).

Update backend privacy filtering logic (getUserProfile and getMemberDirectory) to ensure the new number field is treated as public-only data: owner/admin can see it always; other users can see it only when the profile is Public; and it is blanked when returning a Private profile to non-owners.
